function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Wearable sensors may not be practical to wear many different sensors at one time, leading to limited data collection.","Impact":"Limited data collection may result in inaccurate or incomplete information for health monitoring.","Mitigation":"Developing multimodal and multiplexed sensors to extend functionality and provide additional information for compensation and calibration.","Technologies":"Multimodal and multiplexed sensors technology.","People":"Wearable sensor users.","Owner":"Sensor developers and manufacturers."},{"Description":"Inaccurate measurements due to external factors influencing analyte concentrations in sweat.","Impact":"Inaccurate measurements could lead to incorrect health assessments and monitoring.","Mitigation":"Collecting precise information from the local environment to improve accuracy and reliability of measurements.","Technologies":"Environmental sensing technology and data collection systems.","People":"Individuals using wearable sensors for health monitoring.","Owner":"Technology developers and manufacturers."},{"Description":"Face masks with integrated sensors could provide a false sense of security if not properly calibrated or maintained.","Impact":"False readings may lead to misidentification of infected individuals and potential spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implementing regular calibration and maintenance protocols for integrated sensor technology.","Technologies":"Calibration and maintenance technology for integrated sensors.","People":"Users of face masks with integrated sensors.","Owner":"Health organizations and manufacturers of integrated sensor technology."}]}
